newsitem.title: USA: First Alliance to buy Central and Southern.
newsitem.headline: First Alliance to buy Central and Southern.

text.p: First Alliance Premier Bancshares Inc said Monday that it has agreed to acquire Central and Southern Holding Co, exchanging one share of First Alliance for each share of Central and Southern.

Under the terms of the proposed merger, First Alliance said it will first split its stock at about 1.8 for one. The resulting transaction will result in Central and Southern shareholders receiving about 46 percent of the combined institution's 7.9 million outstanding shares.
The new banking company will be known as Premier Bancshares Inc and have assets in excess of $490 million.
Completion of the deal is expected in the second quarter of 1997, subject to regulatory and shareholder approval.
